file_content.text: Greetings, chosen of Gray Secant! Observational data reports on Coruscant are blue octagon. Direct transmission is possible, but....
...New-built Gree droids are operating nearby. Interactions would be insufferably white nonagon, so I am avoiding detection. Please bear my apologies to Gray Secant, bipedal friend.
Local bipeds have no knowledge of nearby Gree ingenuity! Such a shame.
